dmca.title: canadadance.com infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringement%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

 

________________________________

From: Busby, Ellen [mailto:EBusby@nac-cna.ca] 
Sent: Friday, February 23, 2007 4:53 PM
To: Copyright
Cc: ceaves@bsl.com
Subject: canadadance.com infringement

 

It has come to our attention that the domain

www.canadadance.com <http://www.canadadance.com/> 

which is hosted by The Planet

is using as its home page, material that does not belong to the owners of the site.

 

The visual image is material that belongs to the Canada Dance Festival and its
graphic designers Banfield Seguin Ltd. It was originally posted on our site
www.canadadance.ca <http://www.canadadance.ca/>  as our splash page for a period of
years (since redesigned). 

 

The registered administrative and technical contacts of www.canadadance.com
<http://www.canadadance.com/>  have no current connection our organizations. To our
knowledge, there is no past connection to our organizations. Even if the owner is an
ex-employee of either of our organizations, he or she has no right to use the image.
It was created by Banfield Seguin Ltd. exclusively for the use of the Canada Dance
Festival. 

 

On February 22, 2007, we sent an email to the registrant's email address, as well as
two other potentially related addresses that were discovered in our research,
requesting that the material be removed from the site or that the person justify a
claim of ownership within 24 hours. There has been no response. Pinging the email
addresses show no recognition of the address.

 

We respectfully insist that the front page image of www.canadadance.com
<http://www.canadadance.com/>  be removed immediately. Please contact me at the
coordinates below if you require additional information.

 

 

 

Ellen Busby

General Manager / Directrice g
dmca.principal_name: Canada Dance Festival / Festival Danse Canada
